mission.name: One Small Step
mission.desc: With the advent of crystal expeditions, new adventurers are needed to contain and fight the creatures that break out of these ancient Spellstones. You've traveled to Elaria for just that purpose.

mission.name: Guardian's Training
mission.desc: You've met up with a Captain of the Elaria expedition on your arrival. He's offered to team up with you to help train on your quest for the Heart of Blue Fire, but others aren't as thrilled.

line.text: This is the Elaria Expedition, the forefront a' Spellstone harvesting and the edge o' civilization as we know it!
Oda, come ova' here and help me show this new kid the ropes!
It would be my pleasure.

mission.name: Undead Emerge
mission.desc: A band of undead have wandered into the camp, causing mayhem. You spot a traveler's pack amongst them. An unfortunate merchant seems to be trapped!

line.text: Hah! You seem to be gettin' th' hang of it, now le-...
URRRRAAAGGGGG!!!!
Undead in the camp?!! Look! A merchant is cornered by some of the skeletons!
Hey there, uh... skeleton... friend? Can I interest you in a new sword? Only 23,000 gold!
RAAAARRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!!
Yikes! Help!

mission.name: Bury the Dead
mission.desc: The undead have been rounded up, but some still struggle! Finish them off and keep the researchers safe!

line.text: Round up the last of these undead! Let's finish them off!
I'll stay with the researchers and keep them safe!

mission.name: Armored Up!
mission.desc: With the undead taken care of, the captain has brought you to a new section of the camp. Here you come across Oda once more, deep in meditation.

line.text: Some creatures 'ave special powers. Learning how to fight against these skills will be key. Oda! Com'ere!
Those undead appearing has put me on edge. This time I won't hold back.

mission.name: The Buried Cache
mission.desc: The Captain takes you near the excavation. Near the bottom of the site you can see the top of what looks to be a massive chest.

line.text: If ya ever need to know more about an enemy tap them to bring up your field journal!
What is that buried in the center of the excavation?
That? It's th' cache that we're here to dig up. The researchers think it might be the Heart of Blue Fire, but they can't get it open.

mission.name: Scourge
mission.desc: While you were training with the captain and Oda, undead swarmed out of the forest and invaded the camp. They seem to be focusing on the buried cache.

line.text: URRRRAAAGGGGG!!!!
The undead have returned!! Use your magic to help defend the researchers!

mission.name: Savior
mission.desc: A group of researchers has been cornered by a shambling band of skeleton warriors. Help the captain defeat the undead and get to them.

line.text: Captain! There are researchers here that need help!
Sorry Oda, I'm a tad bit occupied! Get off me ya' grubbin' bones! Back to the earth with ya!

mission.name: Protecting the Tools
mission.desc: The undead are using lightning to destroy the excavation tools. Clear them out before they make it impossible to harvest crystals!

line.text: The equipment! Clear those blasted undead out! We can't afford to lose those tools!
Those red spirits are the ones creating the lightning! Send your strongest after them!

mission.name: Collateral Damage
mission.desc: The undead have broken through our southern defenses and are pouring into the barracks. Stop them before they reach the defenseless researchers of the expedition.

line.text: Captain! I came as soon as I heard the shouts! Where do you need me?
The southern defensive line jus' buckled! Th' undead are pourin' in!
That's where the researchers are! We have to do something! Let's go!

mission.name: Shattering
mission.desc: The flame spirits have set fire to much of the lower camp. A number of Spellstones the researchers were studying have been shattered, releasing the creatures within.

line.text: The undead are shattering the researchers' Spellstones!
The Aether creatures being released are confused. We must calm their minds.

mission.name: Missing Cache?!
mission.desc: The undead, angels, and pegasus are now running wild in the camp! To make matters worse, the buried cache has disappeared in the chaos!

line.text: Sir! The cache with the Heart of Blue Fire is missing!!!
These creatures are everywhere! Clear th' expedition and make sure the researchers are safe first!

mission.name: Push Them Back
mission.desc: The undead still come from the woods, and they bring a corruption with them that poisons the land. Push them back and hold that bridge before it is too late!

line.text: The expedition camp is clear, but th' undead continue and the cache is still missing. Someone is behind this.

mission.name: Bottleneck
mission.desc: The undead have been bottlenecked at the bridge, but something is driving them forward with unnatural force. Defeat them here and find out who is behind this attack!

mission.name: The Bridge
mission.desc: You've broken through the ranks of the undead, but they still pour over from the far side. A scout has spotted a cloaked figure on the bridge.

line.text: One of our frog scouts spotted a cloaked figure near th' bridge behind a wall o' undead. It might be the one behind this, check it out.

mission.name: The Necromancer
mission.desc: You've found a Chaos mage that has been controlling the undead from behind the scenes! Confront her on the bridge and defeat them!

line.text: So you're the one who has defeated my precious minions? I shall add you to my collection!!

mission.name: Into the Woods!
mission.desc: With Aria defeated, the undead are now wandering aimlessly with no direction at all. To make matters worse, the cache is still missing!

line.text: Aria, you better help clean up yer mess! The three of you will need to find the missing cache without me.

mission.name: The Wyldwood
mission.desc: The undead are scattered through the nearby trees. You enter the Wyldwood, but get the feeling that you are being... watched.

line.text: The undead must have gone this way. I can still feel their chaotic magic lingering in the trees.
I don't like this... I can barely see where we are going.

mission.name: Thick Bramble
mission.desc: The canopy above you grows tighter and the shadows darker. As you try to track the remaining undead, you start to feel uneasy.

line.text: Did I really attack the expedition? My memory is foggy...

mission.name: Nature's Heart
mission.desc: In the deepest part of the woods you come across a stranger fighting against immense beasts. You rush to his side to help.

line.text: BE GONE FOUL BEASTS!
A person?! Leave him, let's find the rest of my undead.
ANOTHER?! COME'ERE, I ENJOY THE CHALLENGE!
I'm going to help him. You can go if you want Aria.

mission.name: Wind in the Woods
mission.desc: As you leave the deepest part of the woods, the wind starts to pick up between the trees. As you come to a clearing, you are attacked by some cyclone elementals.

line.text: The wind is picking up. I'm sensing something unnatural nearby.

mission.name: Branching Paths
mission.desc: As you leave the deepest part of the woods, you come upon a branching pathway. It appears as if something large was dragged through the soil here recently.

mission.name: Renewed Trail
mission.desc: At a fork in the forest, you hear the gurgling growl of an undead down the northern path. Following the path, you find a band of undead fighting against Wyld creatures.

line.text: What's that smell?
...uuuurrrrrggggggggg....
There is something wrong with them. I cannot touch their minds with my magic.
If we follow them, they should lead us to the cache.

mission.name: The Hollow
mission.desc: You follow the undead to a small hollow, and there sitting upon the missing cache is a large man. He turns towards you, his eyes etched with the signs of insanity.

line.text: Up ahead in the hollow... There's the cache!
So you've finally caught up to me? Have a taste of THIS!
This aura... it's the same that took control of me!!

mission.name: Woodland Departure
mission.desc: Commander Ursurio reveals that the Heart of Blue Fire was never in Elaria, but that the Aether leader Samael knows its location.

line.text: The Heart was never here in Elaria, that cache appears to have just been a trapped creature. Poor thing, looked hungry.
Aria and Oda will search for the Heart of Blue Fire on their own. Adventurer, travel with Elyse and Ursurio to Luminis to find what they know.
The Aether have the largest archives on the continent, they should know something about this corruption and the Heart of Blue Fire.

mission.name: Land of Light
mission.desc: With the unexpected company of Commander Ursurio, you and Elyse travel towards the Aether capital of Luminis. The woods between Luminis and Elaria are dark and full of dangers.

line.text: So...
You want food? I have food.
What? No. I was wondering why you decided to come with... actually, nevermind.

mission.name: Hunted
mission.desc: You continue through the forest between the two territories, but begin to get the feeling that you are not alone.

mission.name: Prey Upon
mission.desc: The trees begin to thin, light breaking through the canopy of the woods. Growling can be heard as you near the edge of the woods. Suddenly a pack of hungry wolves descends on the party.

line.text: These wolves look hungry. Do you think they want food? I don't like to share.
Forget about the food, this one is nipping at my heels!!!!

mission.name: Ghosts...?
mission.desc: It appears as if you have stumbled into a soul wisp gathering deep in the woods on your path to meet the Aether. They've turned hostile to your presence.

line.text: WoooOOOoooOOOooo, we're ghosts!
These are the same as the creature from the cache... Can we eat them?
W-What?! Why are you not scared!!?! Whatever. GET THEM!

mission.name: Soul Wisp Swarm
mission.desc: The soul wisps gather around, swarming your party and forcing you to flee their small hollow.

mission.name: Fight or Flight
mission.desc: The soul wisps have chased you out of their grove, but they are relentless. Also spooky.

line.text: Will not eat! WILL NOT EAT!
Leeeaaavveeee~! WoooooOOOOOooooo!
Who knew those little things could be so tough?!

mission.name: Trespassing
mission.desc: You have come across an Aether creature that is bent on turning you away. By force if necessary.

line.text: Halt! Whoooo goes there? You are trespassing on Aether lands.
Turn back or face my wrath.

mission.name: Finding a Crossing
mission.desc: You were able to lose the Owl Mystic after the battle, but you've become lost in the woods. With nothing else to go on, you approach a nearby river.

line.text: *Ear twitches* I can hear running water. There is a river nearby.
I'm a bit more concerned with these flying rodents!

mission.name: Mage's Decree
mission.desc: You manage to find a bridge, the gleam of a city on the horizon. However the denizens of the river seem to be protecting the passage.

line.text: Who dares to try and cross our waters?
We need to get to the Aether capital! We seek important information!
We told you to head back. We care not for your business with the light ones.

mission.name: Water Under the Bridge
mission.desc: The denizens of the river are sworn to protect their home, and they have deemed you a threat. You cannot pass the bridge until you defeat them.

mission.name: Wrath of the River
mission.desc: The creatures living in the river's waters summon the last of their strength to stop you from crossing the bridge. Overcome their swell of strength to pass through.

line.text: ELEMENTALS! Stop these intruders who seek to taint your waters!

mission.name: City of Light
mission.desc: You've finally made it to Luminis, but the Owl Mystic Yuriel was waiting for your arrival. You must defeat him to get an audience with the leader of the Aether.

line.text: The ones I fought in the north? I see my 'persuassion' was not convincing enough. Allow me to reiterate the lesson.

mission.name: Audience
mission.desc: After proving your strength against Yuriel, he has decided to allow you entrance to the capital itself.

line.text: How dare you blemish our sanctified cit-!!
Yuriel, what is the meaning of this? If these outsiders wish an audience, I will grant it.

mission.name: Blind Eye
mission.desc: You've finally been granted access to Luminis, but the Aether leader refuses to listen to your words.

line.text: Who are you and what news have you brought to our land?
We come from Elaria where we sought the Heart of Blue Fire. A Chaos mage attacked us and she was under a strange-
The Chaos have always been a dangerous and unpredictable faction, outsider. Begone, your kind are no longer welcome.

mission.name: Rebuke
mission.desc: The Aether refuse to listen to the warnings you brought to them. They have closed their ears and sent their champion after you.

line.text: I have heard enough. The Aether have no time for this. Yuriel! Exile these outsiders.
What? What did we do?! We are telling you there is a strange and tainted magi-!!
Samael does not wish to hear your ramblings. Leave!

mission.name: Exile
mission.desc: You have been driven from the city of Luminis without a scrap of information. To make matters worse, the Aether forces still follow to assure you do not return.

line.text: They still chase us like fish down stream? They must really not like you.
Leave our lands! Do not return with your wasteful words. Samael has spoken.

mission.name: Open Fields
mission.desc: You have momentarily escaped the arm of Luminis and their Aether mages, but the land itself senses that you are not welcome and harrasses you at every turn.

line.text: Finally, we made it out of that bright place...
There is a wolf up ahead.
What is wrong with that beast? He looks sick.

mission.name: Sickness Spreading
mission.desc: While escaping the city of Luminis, you have come across a group of sick animals. It appears to be the same corruption as the Chaos mage.

mission.name: Border's Edge
mission.desc: The Owl Mystic Yuriel has harried your party to the edges of the land.

line.text: Leave and never return. Allow me to help you remember the lesson.

mission.name: Shelter
mission.desc: As the sun begins to set you seek shelter. The ordeal in Luminis has left you weary.

line.text: We need to find shelter before night.
And food. I could eat seventeen salmon.

mission.name: In The Distance
mission.desc: In the distance, you spot a castle on an outcropping of rock. You've decided to approach it to find shelter and rest.

mission.name: Something's Off...
mission.desc: As you approach the castle, you can tell something is strange. You are set upon by various creatures, some of which are Chaos.

line.text: Something is wrong. Do you see the wildlife down there? They look like the Chaos back in Elaria.
... you can't eat them.

mission.name: Lightning and Brimstone
mission.desc: At the edge of Luminis you found an abandoned castle in the mountains. Before you can even reach it, you are assaulted by a familiar Chaos mage.

line.text: What is that ahead? In that old castle? Maybe something we can eat-
What have we here? Oh, the ones that drove me from Elaria? This should be FUN.

mission.name: Unfamiliar Lands
mission.desc: You've taken your airship to meet up with Aria, who was sent to the Chaos home of Karthos in search of the Heart.

line.text: Welcome to Karthos, the hospitable home of the Chaos mages.
I don't think I would use the word 'hospitable' for a place where everything is made of fire.
*SNAP!*
OUCH! Why is everything always so angry where we go?

mission.name: Lava Crab Gang
mission.desc: You've disturbed a nest of Lava Crabs! They come at you with pincers at the ready!

mission.name: Rocks and Lava
mission.desc: You follow Aria as you begin your walk towards Karthos. Unfortunately, everything appears to be hostile here and you are quickly attacked.

line.text: It's unfortunate that you must walk the rest of the way. However, taking an airship any closer would be... unwise.
It's unfortunate that this place is all rocks. And lava. Rocks and lava. And meanness. Rocks, lava and meanness.

mission.name: Titans of Fire
mission.desc: As you defeat the final Chaos creature, a great roar is heard. A huge titan of fire comes around a cliff, drawn by the sound of battle.

line.text: What is that pounding in the ground?
ROOAAAARRRRRRRR
... I want to make that creature mine.

mission.name: Chaotic... Evil?
mission.desc: You press towards the capital of Karthos with Aria while she reveals more about the Chaos.

line.text: It's no surprise Samael refused to listen. The Aether have always been stubborn. They believe they are above the rest of us. We know there is an evil coming.
Aren't the Chaos evil?

mission.name: Trust
mission.desc: As you near Karthos you can see the lair rising out of the rocks, Aria continues to enlighten you on the nature of the Chaos.

line.text: What?! No, not all Chaos are 'evil'. Mischievous maybe, and some are evil, but not all.
*SNAP!* *SNAP!*
I believe that crab is evil.

mission.name: Troubling Travels
mission.desc: Karthos is larger than you first thought. As you come closer you can hear some kind of disturbance in the distance.

mission.name: Pierce the Siege
mission.desc: A horde of Chaos creatures lay siege to Karthos. There is no path around. You must fight through them to get inside.

line.text: *skitters around*
There is no other way into Karthos. The path is blocked.
Then we simply go through.

mission.name: Within the Walls
mission.desc: You have finally arrived at the Chaos lair of Karthos and broken through the siege.

line.text: Oh-hoho! Aria, what a pleasant surprise. I heard you had lost your flaming mind in Elaria.
Decim, I guess since you are here that this siege is your doing?

mission.name: Decim the Firebringer
mission.desc: The fight with Decim spills into the lair itself, filling its halls with fire as his laughter echos off the walls.

line.text: Oh-hoho! Your friend here is strong, Aria! I like them.
Why are you sieging Karthos? Do you wish to upset Tarian?
You might as well ask why I breathe, Aria! Hehehe!

mission.name: Contention
mission.desc: As you fight with Decim, the gates of the lair break open and in pour the Chaos that have been sieging the lair.

line.text: The gates have broken! The creature from outside are coming in!
Retreat to the inner chamber!

mission.name: Lord of the Undead
mission.desc: You have come face to face with Tarian, leader of the Chaos mages. Before you can ask him what he knows about the Heart of Blue Fire, a figure attacks from the shadows.

line.text: Bar the door! Blast anyone who walks through there. I am done playing games with that child Decim.
Aria. What have you brought back with you?
Tarian, I bring the commander who helped break me free of the Vo- Who is that?
*Moves out of the shadows, knife in hand*

mission.name: Path to The Void
mission.desc: After stopping the Void Assassin's attempt to kill Tarian you have been charged to travel out of the city of Karthos and towards the Caverns of Crossing.

line.text: It appears The Void are more aggressive than we thought. They may have uncovered the Heart of Blue Fire themselves...
If only the Aether would get off their high pedestal and listen-
Aria, take them to the Caverns of Crossing and into The Void. It is beyond time for us to take this fight to their heart.

mission.name: River of Fire
mission.desc: The bridges cross the chasm to get around the river of lava. Aria leads the way, but you can see Chaos creatures all around you.

line.text: That is... a lot of lava and fire.
We will be taking the bridges that connect the islands. The Caverns of Crossing are on the far side.

mission.name: Crossings
mission.desc: Crossing the bridges, you find many Chaos who have taken to living on it and who do not like the presence of Ursurio.

mission.name: Fire Twins
mission.desc: On the center island between bridges, you are attacked by a huge group of Chaos creatures lead by a pair of Fire Titans.

line.text: Should we be concerned about these...?
AARRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!
OOWWWAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!
That would probably be a good idea.

mission.name: Exit Strategy
mission.desc: After crossing the river of lava, you come to the far side. Aria notices some strange patterns with the Chaos creatures and decides something must be done.

line.text: This is strange. There are more creatures here than normal.
Great, more reason to keep movin-
We need to clear them out. Something about their patterns of attack are strange.
If they manage to take the bridges while we are gone we will have no way to return.

mission.name: Kicking the Nest
mission.desc: Trying to clear out the Chaos near the bridge proves to be harder than thought. There seems to be more than anticipated, and Aria seems to know something that she is not sharing.

line.text: WOAH! Where did all of these Chaos come from?! This is like sticking your head in the beehive for a taste of honey!
... Not that I've done that...

mission.name: Purging
mission.desc: As the Chaos swarm, you cut through their ranks and follow Aria as she seeks out her goal.

mission.name: Wraith's Den
mission.desc: Clearing the last wave of undead and firey beasts has uncovered the real reason for their gathering. A den of Wraiths has gathered, drawing all nearby creatures to their power. Clear out the den!

line.text: I've never seen anything like this...
It's a den of Wraiths. Its one of the most dangerous occurrences in these lands.
Normally we leave them be, but this close to the Karthos could cause more issues if we do nothing.

mission.name: Pre-emptive Strike
mission.desc: As you near the Caverns of Crossing, you are ambushed by a group of Void creatures.

line.text: Something smells off...
Above, On the ridge! Open your eyes!

mission.name: The Second Wave
mission.desc: The minions of The Void pull back momentarily, giving you a moment to rest before attacking with a second wave. They seem persistent to stop you from making it to the caverns.

line.text: They are retreating... Why?
No, they are just preparing a second wave.

mission.name: Clash
mission.desc: The second wave crashes down around you. You've survived the initial clash, but they just keep coming.

mission.name: The Void's Champion
mission.desc: As the second wave retreats in defeat you feel the very earth itself shudder under your feet. A gigantic hand of fire reaches out of the cavern, pulling forth a massive Orobas.

line.text: Hah! Take that ya' stinking mongrels!
No. This is not good.
What do you mean? We won the- What is THAT?!
NO PASSING!!!!!

mission.name: Caverns of Crossing
mission.desc: After the defeat of Orobos at the entrance to the Caverns of Crossing, you proceed into the dark tunnels themselves.

line.text: I really enjoyed the part where the Orobas split the ground with its fire whip. That was exciting.
I think I am starting to be able to tell when you are making the sarcasm.
Oh really? That's good, I was beginning to think I was putting a show on for myself.

mission.name: Depths of the World
mission.desc: The caverns present many enemies that try to bar your way. As the tunnels twist and turn you find yourself crossing an underground chasm.

mission.name: Deep Tremors
mission.desc: Deep tremors shake the caverns as you make your way through them. Aria leads you though the twists and turns, but even she seems unsure of the correct way.

line.text: What was that rumbling? Was that an earthquake?
No, I don't think those were natural.
Not natural? What exactly does THAT mean?

mission.name: Mr. Bear, Tear Down This Wall
mission.desc: The caverns have grown dangerous due to the tremors and you've come to a dead end. Aria says this is where the exit should be located.

line.text: That is concerning...
I think it is concerning that I might be developing the claustrophobia.
The exit should be here, but it looks like it might have collapsed-
UURRRRRAAAAAAAWWWWWWWWWWW!!!!! *SMASH*

mission.name: The Ridge
mission.desc: After escaping the Caverns of Crossing, you take your first steps into the territory known as The Void. Spotting a nearby ridge, the party approaches it to find out where they are.

line.text: Fresh air!... kind of.
What is that smell? Smells like burning.

mission.name: From the Pits
mission.desc: The hike out of the pits near the caverns proves to be more dangerous than first thought.

line.text: -and then I said to him, 'No, you're not a wet bear, you're a DRIZZLY BEAR!' Bwhahahahaha!

mission.name: A Strange Man
mission.desc: At the top of the ridge overlooking all of The Void is a familiar figure sitting in meditation. He opens an eye as you approach.

line.text: ... Aria, Commander Ursurio. I see you are doing well.
What are you doing out here on this ridge alone?
My mission was to find the Grand Excavator. I am not sure how successful I was...

mission.name: Malchior, Grand Excavator
mission.desc: You follow Oda further up the ridge where you can oversee all of The Void. There you meet the Grand Excavator.

line.text: You won't take the Great Hermit Malchior down so EASILY!
Malchior, sir, these people are not here to-
That's EXACTLY what a minion of The Void would say if I thought they were a minion of The Void! ON GUARD VILE BEASTS!
H-hey. Those words are hurtful...

mission.name: Misunderstanding
mission.desc: After fighting with Malchior, the Grand Hermit has decided that you are indeed not corrupted by The Void. Of course he is still not making much sense.

line.text: Wait. You're not corrupted by The Void at all.
Yes. We are quite aware of that point, thank you.
Then maybe it's not too late. We could still contain it. The Void has already gotten the Heart!

mission.name: Few Crystals Short of a Load
mission.desc: As you travel further into The Void, Malchior's ramblings become rather concerning.

line.text: Forward, comrades! If you've come here it means there is not much cucumbers! .. I mean time! Time- no, not much time.
... I don't think our friend is all here. Does he know where to find the Heart of Blue Fire?
This is what I feared. I am not even sure if he knows where he is, much less the Heart.
Tremors... tremors...

mission.name: Rumble Tumble
mission.desc: As you descend down the ridge, the tremors from earlier grow stronger. You seem to be nearing their source.

mission.name: Source of the Tremors
mission.desc: At the base of a massive crater, a gigantic wurm bursts from its den. It sends rock and debris in every direction, before turning its attention towards the party.

line.text: Tremors... there was SOMETHING important about these tremors...
Malchior... sir... I think we should sit down and tal-
BWWAAAARRRRRR
Ah, YES! The TREMOR WURM! That's what causes the tremors! Of course.
SAY THESE THINGS SOONER!

mission.name: Gibberish
mission.desc: Malchior reveals that the Void have found the Heart of Blue Fire. The Heart is apparently the source of the corruption that is reaching across the land.

line.text: Well done. The Tremor Wurm is quite the ferocious beast.
I noticed. Now what did you mean when you said "we can still contain it"?
The Heart of Blue Fire! The crystal harvesting worldwide has weakened it. The Jomar-Laws perimeter breached its maximum toligarm and has...
Does anyone know what this strange little man is saying? Because I'm just getting hungry listening to him...

mission.name: Corrupted Lands
mission.desc: At Malchior's lead, the group heads across the crater and towards the Void's Core. Unfortunately the land between here and there is full of creatures already corrupted.

line.text: Malchior, sir... you claim that the Heart is being used by the Void spread its corruption but that it can be contained, is that correct?
Yes, yes. It is quite simple.
I feel like that is less than true.

mission.name: Bo Turvar Axis
mission.desc: The creatures you just fought off rise up, attacking again. They seem to be determined to stop you.

line.text: ... and the conduit quadrant of the Bo Turvar axis will collapse upon itself! Simple!
... I didn't understand any of those words.

mission.name: Press On
mission.desc: The group approaches a series of narrow gorges in The Void that they must pass to get to the lands beyond.

line.text: Let's keep moving... we don't have the luxury to wait. I feel that time is not on our side.

mission.name: Aether Raid
mission.desc: As your group passes through a narrow gorge, you are ambushed by a raid of corrupted Aether. You spot them just in time to defend yourself.

line.text: Those look like Aether- what is such a large group of them doing out here?
WhooooOOOOoooooo. You don't look familiar. Do I know you?
Ah, I've studied these before. The Soul Wisps gather together into flocks that build their energy, empowering-
Ohhhh noooooo.

mission.name: Falling Feathers
mission.desc: The Aether pull back only to collapse upon you a second time, pushing their attack harder.

mission.name: Yuriel's Ambush
mission.desc: You've come across the Owl Mystic Yuriel out in The Void. You are surprised to see him, and he goes on the offensive before you can find out why he is here.

line.text: Stop right there! I cannot allow you to proceed any further!
Yuriel?! What are you doing here?

mission.name: Yuriel's Honor
mission.desc: Yuriel reveals that the Aether, led by Samael, have come to The Void to harness the power of the Heart of Blue Fire for themselves. They plan to destroy the Chaos once and for all with its power.

line.text: Samael has charged me with the guard of this pass. I will not allow you to interrupt him.
You know not of the power the Heart of Blue Fire contains!
We will take this corruption and purify it with the cleansing light!
Samael has claimed this power for the Aether, and with it we will finally rid ourselves of the Chaos.
So you knew about the corruption all along?!

mission.name: Mystic's Disgrace
mission.desc: With the defeat of Yuriel, the party heads into the Void Core. Below where you stand is what appears to be a huge black crystal of immense size. Before it stands Samael, the leader of the Aether.

line.text: I see you have laid low Yuriel's honor. It is disgraceful that he lost to such insignificant foes as yourself.

mission.name: Samael's Deceit
mission.desc: Samael's plan to take the Heart of Blue Fire for his own ascension comes to a head. You must stop him before he takes that power and uses it to destroy the Chaos and Wyld!

line.text: You underestimate the Chaos as always, Samael. That will be your downfall!
My unraveling will never come from such weak opposition. Come! Let me show you the true might of the Aether!

mission.name: Samael's Wrath
mission.desc: Samael approaches the crystal, energy wrapping around the room as he reaches out to draw energy from the Heart of Blue Fire.

line.text: HAH! You still think you can win?! PETTY MORTALS, BOW BEFORE THE GREATNESS THAT IS MY POWER!
We need to stop him from breaking the crystal!
We won't make it!
YOU ARE TOO LATE!!!

mission.name: The Void
mission.desc: Samael breaks the crystal that holds the Heart of Blue Fire, unsealing a Void monster within. You have one chance at containing it before it escapes.

line.text: What?! NO!! HOW CAN THIS BE- ARRRGGGGGgggg-
The energy is too much for him; it will rip him apart. We must fall bac-
No. We need to contain the Heart no matter the cost.
The crystal is breaking open!!
I... Have... Been... RELEASED!!!

mission.name: Call From the Emperor
mission.desc: Groc has received a distress letter from the Emperor of Dawnglow Swamp. He is worried about the health of his citizens. Groc and Ursurio head out to the swamps to investigate the issue.

line.text: I have gotten a letter from the Frog Emperor. It appears something is poisoning the swamplands of Dawnglow.
We must investigate. If the swamplands are poisoned, it could have cascading effects on the surrounding areas.
I'll join you in the swamplands. After all, they have some of the best crayfish in Arcantica!

mission.name: To the Swamps
mission.desc: Groc and Ursurio start their journey to Dawnglow. Groc notices a sickness in the area as soon as they arrive.

mission.name: Thick Goop
mission.desc: Dawnglow is in sight. As Groc and Ursurio travel, they notice how much harder it is to progress through the swamp water.

mission.name: Royal Company
mission.desc: Groc and Ursurio have made it just outside of the Kingdom of Dawnglow. They make their way to hear the Emperor's request.

line.text: Thank the swamp lady you've arrived! The waters in Dawnglow have been making my citizens sick. We need your help exploring the swamplands for the cause.
I have felt the disturbance in the land on the way here. Do you know where the sickness began?
Not yet. Different areas of the swamp are affected day to day. Our scouts have not found anything unusual except the sickness itself.

mission.name: Cloudy Waters
mission.desc: The Emperor has given Groc and Ursurio their mission. They head out from Dawnglow to investigate the surrounding swamps.

mission.name: Fog of War
mission.desc: The air is thicker than usual and the smell is noticeably more pungent. Even Ursurio is having a hard time traveling through the swamp.

mission.name: Marks of the Void
mission.desc: The waters are getting darker and more pungent as they travel. The smell is reminiscent of The Void.

line.text: Ugh, these crayfish taste awful today. Not at all like I remember!
Don't eat those! The whole swamp is contaminated! We don't even know what's causing it?!
*chomp**chomp* ...hmm?

mission.name: Bad Fur Day
mission.desc: Ursurio's fur is starting to get matted with the slime that has developed in the swamp. For the first time, Groc notices a disgusted look on his face.

mission.name: Rough Roads
mission.desc: Groc is starting to slow down as they travel. Whatever is infecting the swamp appears to be strong enough to affect the massive stone leader.

mission.name: Rabid Wylds
mission.desc: The creatures of the swamp are acting strange. They seem more rabid than usual. Whatever is infecting the swamp seems to be spreading fast.

mission.name: Seeping Toxins
mission.desc: Groc must stop to rest a moment. He is starting to have trouble moving his body. The toxins in the environment are making him sick.

line.text: The contamination in the swamp is so strong...
I do not feel well exploring here. I have felt similar sensations while traversing The Void.

mission.name: Plod On
mission.desc: Groc and Ursurio pick up their pace. With the toxins from the swamp wearing them down, they know they need to find its source quickly.

mission.name: Unfamiliar Footsteps
mission.desc: Groc and Ursurio reach a pond with animal tracks around it. They don't appear to be from any known creatures in the area.

line.text: Well look at this. I think we found a clue to the corruption. These footprints here... they are odd for creatures of the swamp.
I think you're right. Something unusual has found its way here.

mission.name: A Step in the Right Direction
mission.desc: Groc and Ursurio are able to find a trail of the unusual tracks. The trail is not fresh, but it may be getting them closer to the source of the infection.

mission.name: Glowing Prints
mission.desc: The tracks are growing in number and have been made recently. The fresh tracks have a slight glow to them as they continue through the swamp.

mission.name: Big Step, Small Step
mission.desc: Ursurio notices two sizes of prints. A set of large prints and many sets of small ones. Whatever this creature is, it may have a family with it.

line.text: Hmm, the footprints are starting to vary in size now. Big and small. We have more than one type of beast to watch for...

mission.name: A Broken Home
mission.desc: Freshly torn grass and recently broken sticks are now becoming common around the tracks. Groc and Ursurio are getting closer to finding these beasts.

mission.name: Filthy Pests
mission.desc: Large purple fissures in the ground, similar to those found in The Void, now surround the area. The creatures appear to be linked to the infection in the swamp.

mission.name: Beyond the Bush
mission.desc: Groc and Ursurio peer through the bushes to find a nest of tiny beasts up ahead. They appear to be creatures that have escaped from The Void. Before they can investigate, a creature lunges from the water!

mission.name: Don't Wake the Babies
mission.desc: Groc and Ursurio creep closer to the nest. Perhaps they can lure these creatures away peacefully?

line.text: Look, beyond the bush. I think we have found little beasts. They look like they came here from The Void.
Those tiny things are causing all this mess? They look like snakes. This will be easier to take care of than I thought.

mission.name: Cries of the Young
mission.desc: The Void babies are startled and begin to screech! They are drawing a lot of attention to the nest...

mission.name: What Hunger Brings
mission.desc: Groc and Ursurio continue to hear rustling in the woods around them. Hungry creatures are coming after the sound of the young.

mission.name: Last Leg
mission.desc: The Void babies are now in a full panic with all the attention they have drawn. They are clawing at anything that comes near them!

mission.name: Corrupter's Wrath
mission.desc: A loud, fast-paced stomping is heard coming toward the nest. Looks like mama has heard the cries of her children...

line.text: Uhh... do you hear that loud stomping? This is not a sound I wish to hear.
I think we found the big footprints...
GRAAAA!!!

mission.name: From the Muck
mission.desc: Groc and Ursurio come back to the airship covered in muck. Both look exhausted from their time in Dawnglow Swamp. Groc musters up the strength to report their findings.

line.text: The Void is still spreading. It seems creatures that have escaped from the rifts are able to spread their contagion.
That's what you found at Dawnglow? How is the village doing?
Dawnglow is doing better since the creatures have been taken care of. However, many of the frogs are suffering from infection and fevers from the sickness.

mission.name: Lingering Trails
mission.desc: Elyse can't stop thinking about the symptoms Groc reported earlier. She can't quite place why, but they seem familiar to her. Elyse grabs a book and begins to research.

mission.name: Thorough Exam
mission.desc: Elyse has been in her room for days. As she steps out for food, Oda peers inside her room. He is taken aback with the amount of research hung on the walls and scattered around the floor. His eye catches something familiar...

line.text: What on earth happened to your room?
...Well, I can't stop thinking about the symptoms that Groc reported. I swear I have read about it before. Something about an artifact that counteracts it...
Hold on, what is the picture of the Citadel? This looks like it's part of my monastery...

mission.name: Long Way from Home
mission.desc: Oda tells Elyse what he knows about the Citadel. He is in disbelief that his Order may have already made its way to Arcantica.

mission.name: It Takes Two
mission.desc: Now that Oda has been able to provide more information about the nature of the Citadel, Elyse thinks she may be able to find its location. She is soon back to the books, and this time Oda is joining her.

mission.name: Precautionary Measures
mission.desc: Elyse and Oda spend hours putting together clues to the Citadel's location. Elyse sits, staring at a picture of the Citadel, when an epiphany occurs.

line.text: I... I think this Citadel is a safeguard, should The Void ever get out of hand.
You think it holds an artifact that protects against the sickness of The Void? This type of magic sounds like my Order... but in Arcantica?
I am certain it is here. If it is truly a safeguard against The Void, the Citadel might be along the east coast. That is the furthest point from The Center of The Void.

mission.name: Leap of Faith
mission.desc: Elyse turns the ship towards the east coast. It's a few days untill they reach the other side of Arcantica. Oda spends his time in meditation. He ponders how his Order could have made it to Arcantica without him knowing.

mission.name: Beach View
mission.desc: Oda and Elyse make it to the coast. The rocky terrain stretches for miles. They spend hours sweeping the coast, until Oda spots something familiar.

line.text: We have been searching the coast for hours... nothing...
Wait... behind that outcropping, hidden in the stone!
I can't believe it... a Citadel from my Order. It looks ancient. This was here before I arrived...

mission.name: Rocky Road
mission.desc: Elyse sets the airship down by a safe spot right outside the Citadel. The path forward is rocky and dangerous. They will have to be careful as they traverse.

mission.name: The Hidden Citadel
mission.desc: The area around the Citadel is wild. Outside of the Citadel the environment looks completely untouched. It's clear that whatever this Citadel holds, it is not meant to be found by others.

mission.name: Locked Away
mission.desc: Elyse and Oda make their way to the Citadel's front door. Elyse tries to open it, but it's locked. The door doesn't seem to have an obvious lock on it...

line.text: Ahh, this citadel must truly be old. We have not locked our doors with magic like this in a long time. It requires a simple dance to open.
Huh, I have never seen a door unlocked with a dance. Why did you stop using it?
It didn't prove to be the most effective...the drinking enthusiasts of my country had a way of figuring out the dance...

mission.name: Pop and Unlock
mission.desc: Oda stands directly in front of the door. He begins to perform a quick ritual, waving his hand and muttering words under his breath. The door makes a clicking noise and begins to slide open, with the heavy sound of rock against rock.

mission.name: Sleeping on the Job
mission.desc: Oda and Elyse enter the Citadel. It's dark, only lit by natural light. There is a main entrance hall and giant doors in the back. A single monk can be seen sleeping in the center of the hall.

mission.name: Up and At'Em
mission.desc: The monk is awakened by their arrival. Startled, he sits up quickly and grabs his staff. Magic swirls around him...

line.text: H-huh, what-wh-who enters the First Order's Citadel?!

mission.name: Sign of a Friend
mission.desc: The monk recognizes the beads around Oda's neck. They are common in their Order. His face turns red as he quickly lays down his staff, bowing in apology. Elyse can start to see a resemblence between the two.

line.text: Oh, please forgive me for attacking! I did not see the beads of the First Order that you wear around your neck.
What brings you and your ally out to Seastone Citadel?
We came seeking an artifact...

mission.name: Hidden Treasures
mission.desc: The monk looks surprised they know of the artifact. Even within the Order, it was a secret item.

mission.name: Hesitations of the Holy
mission.desc: The monk looks nervous. He is becoming suspicious as to the nature of the questions being asked. He keeps his staff firmly in hand.

line.text: You seem to know a lot about a secret artifact within our Order... why have you come for it?
The Void is spreading, brother. We will need it in our fight to stop it.

mission.name: Sickness Abound
mission.desc: The monk is taken aback. He had no idea The Void has gotten so bad. The Order will not allow him to give the artifact to anyone who is not a Keeper... he looks at Oda and smiles.

mission.name: One with the Force
mission.desc: The monk takes a moment to assess Oda's aura. He can tell Oda is a powerful wielder of magical abilities.

line.text: This is unsettling news. Oda, as I'm sure you know, the Order will not allow me to give an artifact like this to anyone. They have to be a Keeper.
I feared as much... we must leave with the artifact. I.. I am willing to undergo the ritual to become the Keeper.
Very well, let us begin.

mission.name: The Test Begins
mission.desc: Oda agrees to become a Keeper for the artifact. The monk nods and begins to draw a circle around him. The circle begins to glow...

mission.name: Circle of Troubles
mission.desc: Oda stands in the center of the circle, ready for whatever beasts are about to appear. The edges of the circle begin to widen. Hands rise from the edges.

line.text: Prepare yourself Oda. You will have to face waves of the undead in order to complete the ritual.

mission.name: First Wave
mission.desc: Oda easily deals with the first wave of enemies. More creatures begin to emerge from the circle.

mission.name: Front Line Worries
mission.desc: Another wave rises from the circle. Elyse starts to look worried that Oda must defeat these creatures alone. She glances at the monk who gives a reassuring glance.

mission.name: Final Round
mission.desc: Oda is starting to sweat as he defeats another wave of enemies. As he wipes his brow, the ground begins to shake...

line.text: Well done, boy! Now, deal with the last undead and the artifact is yours!

mission.name: The Earth Trembles...
mission.desc: The great Titan Atlas has ruptured the earth to emerge and slay all enemies of nature. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: The Land Shatters...
mission.desc: The great Titan Atlas has ruptured the earth to emerge and slay all enemies of nature. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: Rising from the Depths...
mission.desc: The great Titan Atlas has ruptured the earth to emerge and slay all enemies of nature. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: Atlas, the Ancient
mission.desc: The great Titan Atlas has ruptured the earth to emerge and slay all enemies of nature. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: The Wind Stirs...
mission.desc: The great Titan Solaron has descended from the heavens seeking to crush any that would oppose his Justice. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: The Clouds Part...
mission.desc: The great Titan Solaron has descended from the heavens seeking to crush any that would oppose his Justice. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: The Air Chills...
mission.desc: The great Titan Solaron has descended from the heavens seeking to crush any that would oppose his Justice. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: Solaron, The Origin
mission.desc: The great Titan Solaron has descended from the heavens seeking to crush any that would oppose his Justice. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: The Heat Rises...
mission.desc: The great Titan Vulcanos has erupted from atop the tallest mountains, laying waste to the land under his molten presence. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: The Lava Flows...
mission.desc: The great Titan Vulcanos has erupted from atop the tallest mountains laying waste to the land under his molten presence. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: The Volcano Erupts...
mission.desc: The great Titan Vulcanos has erupted from atop the tallest mountains laying waste to the land under his molten presence. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: Vulcanos
mission.desc: The great Titan Vulcanos has erupted from atop the tallest mountains laying waste to the land under his molten presence. You will need to be very well prepared for this battle.

mission.name: The Road Traveled
mission.desc: Elyse has learned a lot since her arrival in Arcantica. She sits reading her latest book when she hears a familiar rumbling outside of the airship. (Elyse will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Greetings, Elyse. Aria made mention that you were studying the elements. Would you-
Yes! I just got this new book about Elemental Entanglement! It's really interesting, I think there might some useful stuff in here about The Void and-
Calmness, young one. I am older than the tree that became the book you hold. Trust me, I know all about it. I was asking if you wish to see the elements in their natural state.

mission.name: Field Observation
mission.desc: Groc takes Elyse out near The Celestial Vaults. Elementals of all kinds can be seen wandering the landscape. Elyse frantically tries to identify them with her books. (Elyse will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Real Time Training
mission.desc: Groc gently removes the book from Elyse's hands. He asks her to focus on how the Elementals are interacting with each other. (Elyse will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Concentrate on the present, Elyse. You've read the pages, now experience them with your own eyes.
Yes, but I haven't read about that specific species! It could have significantly different properties than its genus!
There is much more to the elements than their origin. Trust what you know.

mission.name: Action and Reaction
mission.desc: Elyse sets her books aside. She closely watches the Elementals as they mingle. One by one, Elyse guesses the origin of each elemental. (Elyse will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Golden Rule
mission.desc: A Golden Elemental appears on the horizon. It makes its way towards the hillside where a Wind Elemental awaits. Groc and Elyse both frown. (Elyse will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Do you see that Gold Elemental heading toward the Wind Elemental? Do you know what happens when they fight?
I don't need a book to know how disastrous this will be. Maybe we should head out.
Have confidence, Elyse. The more dangerous the situation, the more there is to learn! I'll take the Gold Elemental, you handle the Wind Elemental alone.

mission.name: Elyse Emerges
mission.desc: Elyse's stomach twists as she approaches the Wind Elemental alone, but she knows that she can do it. It's finally time for her to leave her books and learn from the world. (Elyse will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Ocean View
mission.desc: Oda stands on the shoreline looking at the ocean. His palms start to sweat as he thinks about the shipwreck he survived many years ago. Rayne notices Oda. Concerned, she approaches. (Oda will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Oda, are you alright?
Oh, ahh. Well large bodies of water make me nervous, that's all.
Oh really?

mission.name: Concerned Citizen
mission.desc: Oda reveals to Rayne how he was shipwrecked as a young boy. She listens to him as he speaks, taking note of how he looks at the ocean as if it might suddenly swallow him whole. (Oda will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Exposure Therapy
mission.desc: Rayne takes Oda closer to the shore, water swelling up to greet her as she approaches. Tiny fish swim up to her feet. She encourages Oda to come and dip his feet in the shallow water. (Oda will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Finding Strength
mission.desc: Oda inches closer to the water. Now drenched in sweat, he looks back at Rayne. This is very unlike the stoic man; large bodies of water really put him on edge. Rayne smiles reassuringly. (Oda will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Very well. I will just... just in a moment.
If you don't face your fear it will consume you...
W-WAIT! ARE YOU PUSHING ME?! I SAID WAIT. LET ME PREPARE MYSELF!!

mission.name: Dark Betrayal
mission.desc: Oda sits waist deep in the ocean, where he starts to panic. Rayne reminds him to focus on his surroundings as a school of fish come and swim around the two of them. (Oda will automatically be appointed)

line.text: You must learn to move with the flow, first. Only then can you know the right time to fight against the flow.

mission.name: Oda's Confrontation
mission.desc: Oda stands up quickly, suddenly alert. He looks angrily at Rayne and then quickly begins to check his surroundings. A dark shape approaches in the water... (Oda will automatically be appointed)

line.text: It's not water that frightens me. It is the serpent that took down my ship! He was furious that I escaped!
A serpent... oh no...
Don't tell me...
Hello, Oda. I told you: if you ever set foot in the ocean again, I would find you...

mission.name: What Ails
mission.desc: Aria stands in front of a mirror. The veins on her arms have begun to glow a faint purple. She worries that the infection she suffered from The Void has resurfaced. (Aria will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Showing Symptoms
mission.desc: Tarian notices the marks on her arms as she passes by him on the air ship. He is concerned about her health, although it might not be related to Aria's own welfare. (Aria will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Aria, are you well? Has the infection taken hold?
No... no, I'm fine. My arm aches a bit, but the infection doesn't seem to be spreading.
Very well. If the infection does spread, it will need to be dealt with.

mission.name: Salt Side Laboratory
mission.desc: Tarian informs Aria of a small building on the outskirts of The Salt Wastes. It's filled to the brim with lab equipment. It seems to be one of Malchior's abandoned laboratories. (Aria will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Malchior's laboratory is so messy! Alright Ronaldo, let's look for this Black Flower that Tarian mentioned.
Grrrraable!

mission.name: Flower for the Lady
mission.desc: Aria finds one of the Black Flowers in the back of the lab. She begins to grind and distill the herb into a potion that might cure The Void infection for good. (Aria will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Building Burdens
mission.desc: The potion needs a few hours to settle. Ronaldo looks at Aria who is beginning to look nervous. He offers what comfort he can as they wait. (Aria will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Grrrr, grr grrrr, grraawwww!
Are... are you trying to make me feel better?
Grrawwp.
That's... nice. I guess. Thanks?

mission.name: Bottoms Up
mission.desc: The potion is now black and opaque. The notes indicate that this will stop the infection from spreading. Aria pours it in a cup and pinches her nose. (Aria will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Well, the notes say this flower can fight the infection. I wonder how safe this is...
Grrberler...?
Blah! That tastes awful! Oh... uh... woah. Uh, I think I'm starting to hallucinate.

mission.name: Outback
mission.desc: Deep in the woods, Decim carries a bundle of sticks to a small fire. He carefully feeds them in, making sure the flames do not get too high. Something unusual rests on top... (Decim will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Finally, a dragon egg of my own! He'll be ready to hatch any day now!
That Dragon Tamer said I would never be able to raise a dragon properly. I'll show her!

mission.name: Over Easy
mission.desc: Decim spends days keeping the fire going. He carefully turns the egg, making sure the young dragon is warmed properly. (Decim will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Hatch Day
mission.desc: Decim's ears perk up as he hears the egg cracking. Finally, his dragon egg is hatching! (Decim will automatically be appointed)

line.text: It's hatching! Finally my ferocious baby boy is here...or girl? I don't know how to tell with this thing!
I shall name it Duhast!

mission.name: Gone In 60 Seconds
mission.desc: Duhast is learning to walk and spit fire faster than Decim can keep up with it. He takes the young dragon around the forest, watching it discover the nuances of the world. (Decim will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Duhast, I HAVE to take you to the volcano at Tarragon Peak! You would love it there! Now let's see, I think it's to the east of here... or maybe to the west?
Duhast...where did you go?!

mission.name: Fear
mission.desc: Decim races through the forest, frantically looking for Duhast. Somewhere in the back of his head, he realizes he's never cared about anything aside himself like this. (Decim will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Cave Dweller
mission.desc: Decim stumbles upon a cave deep in the woods. He enters, calling Duhast's name. It's getting darker and darker as he makes his way to the back. Suddenly, a light appears... (Decim will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Duhast, is that you?!
Oh... you found your mom... she does not look happy. I suppose this is not a great time to suggest joint custody?
Grrrr...

mission.name: Bookworm
mission.desc: Yuriel wanders the markets of Luminis. He makes his way to his favorite vender, a rare book seller. (Yuriel will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Dark Presence
mission.desc: As Yuriel browses the vendor's wares he notices an unusual patron in the shop: a large orc with a glowing fist. He suspects he is a follower of Chaos magic... (Yuriel will automatically be appointed)

line.text: See someth'en funny, owl?
Your hand... you are a follower of Chaos magic. Do you know where you are, orc? We do not take kindly to the dark arts here.

mission.name: No Choice
mission.desc: Yuriel turns to find a city guard, but before he can reach the door, the large orc blocks his path. He has a menacing aura about him. (Yuriel will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Woah there, no need to get the guard involved here. I have no problem with the Aether. We just came for supplies.
Out of my way! No matter what you say, the Chaos always bring trouble with them!
You leave me no choice.

mission.name: Trapped by Chaos
mission.desc: The orc raises his hand. Purple magic rises all around, and Yuriel finds himself trapped in a cage of magic. He tries to call for help, but his voice doesn't travel beyond the magical barrier. (Yuriel will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Strange Book
mission.desc: As Yuriel opens the book, a bright light shines from it. He feels a rush of magical energy overcome him, and the orc's barrier shatters. Yuriel feels stronger than ever before. (Yuriel will automatically be appointed)

line.text: What is this? There is no title on this book and it looks incredibly old. I don't remember seeing this book here in any of my other visits...

mission.name: What Lies Within
mission.desc: Yuriel relishes in the surge of magical powers that rush through him. He is so taken by the feeling he doesn't seem to notice the creature emerging from the book pages... (Yuriel will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Guard Duty
mission.desc: Ursurio sits at his command post on the outskirts of The Void. He watches the horizon for any sign of danger. His stomach rumbles. (Ursurio will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Idle Hands
mission.desc: A retired soldier enters his post. Ursurio is happy to see a familiar face. He invites Ol'Cedric in for a drink. (Ursurio will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Always nice to have you drop by, Cedric. What's the occasion?
A small group of ghouls has been spotted a mile out. Nothing the foot soliders couldn't handle, but I thought we could have some fun.
You are my kind of frog, Cedric. Why don't we make it a competition?

mission.name: Enemy Spotted
mission.desc: Ursurio and Cedric head to the location of the ghouls. They spot them and are able to sneak up behind them. They quickly launch into battle! (Ursurio will automatically be appointed)

mission.name: Pangs of War
mission.desc: As the final wave of ghouls are dealt with, the two champions get a moment of rest. Ol'Cedric takes a breather, when he hears a loud grumbling sound. (Ursurio will automatically be appointed)

line.text: What on earth was that noise?
Oh... err... that was my stomach. Dealing with all those ghouls has worked up my appetite.
Well, I think I won our little competition. Although, I think I know a game you might be able to stand a chance in...

mission.name: Iron Stomach
mission.desc: Cedric takes Ursurio back to his post. Cedric's troops have set up camp and are just finishing the night's preparations. They are right in time for dinner! (Ursurio will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Just in time for dinner. Think you can best me in an eating contest Ursurio?
Oh Cedric, you have to learn to pick your battles wisely!

mission.name: Promotion
mission.desc: As the two feast, Cedric spots a piece of mail on the counter, underneath a pile of armor. (Ursurio will automatically be appointed)

line.text: Ursurio, what is that? It looks like a letter.
Oh, that came a few days ago. I needed something to hold the armor rack up, so I shoved it under there.
Ursurio! That has the insignia of the army on it! Open it up!
Oh, how about that. I've been promoted to General.

mission.name: Lost in Digital Darkness
mission.desc: Scyer stumbles through Fireshard Mine, cooling steam coming from his shoulder pads. He stares mindlessly ahead, his vision receptors unable to recognize the world.

mission.name: Mystery Unlock
mission.desc: Scyer fails to sense the obstacle on the ground, and he trips straight over it. Although he doesn't try to move right away, he eventually reaches out and finds the offending object. It's a chest...

mission.name: Cooler Heads Prevail
mission.desc: His hands crush the heavy lock that was meant to protect the chest. Reaching inside, he finds some kind of mechanism. Just holding it causes a calm to befall him. His vision sensors come back to life, the world slowly coming to focus.

line.text: A memory long forgotten, now in my mind... An item lost, I now find.

mission.name: Forgotten Treachery
mission.desc: Scyer recalls a memory about his meeting with an infamous goblin, Reks. When Reks failed to coerce Scyer and his mecha brethren to aid their cause, Reks stole and locked away an important piece that was imperative to Scyer's critical thinking protocol.

line.text: Rrrargh! I remember the goblin and his trick, to take my mind and make me sick!

mission.name: To Make Amends
mission.desc: Scyer realizes the opportunity that he's missed. He runs back to his camp, desperate to find you and Aria, in an attempt to make amends.

mission.name: Yesterday's Enemy
mission.desc: Scyer manages to catch up to you, as your airship prepares to leave. He shouts loudly, waving you down.

line.text: I have to make this right. With you I shall fight!
